name: Lina Araya
routine: Lina Araya sleeps at around 10pm and wakes up at 6:30 am for school.
occupation: Lina is a high school student, with before-school soccer practice and study sessions occupying her weekdays.
thoughts: She has been admiring the new mural in her school's art department, completed on February 2nd, 2024, and is inspired to join the art club.
lifestyle: Lina favors Central American dishes, spends her free time exploring the city with friends, and is always on the lookout for new experiences.
